About

Hosting an event? 
 Have picky guests and cannot figure out how to seat them? 
 No problem! 

 Seat Suite uses advanced algorithms to keep all of your guests happy.

 Just add your guests, set their seating preferences, and click go!

 It is that simple. The perfect seating arrangement is generated just for your event.
 An event with just fourteen guests has over 87 BILLION possible seating arrangements.

So drop the pen and paper and let Seat Suite do all of the work for you! 

 In just five minutes you will have the perfect seating plan so you can focus on having fun at your party.

 But don't just take our word for it- try it out and see for yourself! 
 Happy guests make happy hosts, so here's to a great party, thrown by you!
Help
Welcome to Seat Suite. Lets help you get started!
Here is where you can view all the guests you\'ve added
- To add a guest, tap the + icon at the top right.
- To delete a guest, slide their name left and tap delete.
- To edit a guest, tap their name
- To delete all guests, tap the trash icon on the toolbar
Here is where you can add a new guest, or edit an existing one
- Set the user\'s name and age in the provided fields
- Tip: After setting your guests age, try using the auto-generate preferences feature at the top right of the preference list
- Move the sliders to set your guest\'s preferences
- Tip: The red symbol will ensure guest A won\'t sit next to guest B
- Tip: The star will ensure guest A will sit next to guest B
Here is where the magic happens! Let\'s seat your guests
- Simply tap Go! to generate the perfect seating arrangement
- OR you can tap a seat to set who should sit there. Set as many as you want, then tap Go!
- You can clear your selection by tapping the Clear button (same as go)
- Tapping a seatted guest will tell you how happy they are with their neighbors, on a scale of 0 to 20
Good Luck and enjoy the party!
